note: Values may exceed 100% when children who are older or younger than the official age group also enroll.
title: Share of children enrolled in lower secondary school
subtitle: Shown as the [gross enrolment ratio](#dod:gross-enrolment-ratio) â€” the number of children, regardless of their age, who are enrolled in [lower secondary](#dod:lower-secondary-education) education, expressed as a percentage of the population of lower secondary school age (between 11 and 14 years old).
